channel.title: How to make a two-reward recipe
channel.description:
how to make a two-reward recipe.
how to separate objects in a factory (or ???). for example, we have limestone and process it into sand and stones. is it possible to implement and what classes

item.title: How to make a two-reward recipe
item.dc:creator: @Thijn_Smulders thijnmens
item.description:
@Thijn_Smulders wrote:

I think the only way is to create your own machine to support that, tutorial for making a machine is in the docs

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a two-reward recipe
